name: Kimberly Diaz | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
name_original: Kimberly Diaz | Games Development - 3D Game Assessment
description: The tiny human kingdom once lived in peace, cooking and gathering with the lonely human princess until one day they've been driven out the kitchen by a flock of crazy chickens! They've taken over everything they love! The plates, the food and the chocolates, everything! All hope seemed lost for the once flourishing kingdom before a brave and young (tiny) human decides to get to the bottom of this! And save all the chocolates! Oops, I mean the kitchen!
